title: Strategy Targets 7% of Total Bitcoin Supply Worth $167B
summary: Michael Saylor revealed Strategy could ultimately own 7% of total BTC supply (1.47M BTC worth ~$167B), up from current 3% holdings. CEO Phong Le announced plans to surpass Berkshire Hathaway's $328B treasury to become the largest corporate treasury regardless of asset type.

title: Ancient Bitcoin Whale Moves Millions After 12-Year Dormancy
summary: A Bitcoin whale moved millions worth of BTC after remaining dormant for 12 years, representing one of the longest-held Bitcoin positions finally becoming active. Such ancient whale movements often signal significant market shifts and can impact price dynamics due to the large volumes involved.

title: OpenSea Manager's Crypto Insider Trading Conviction Overturned
summary: Former OpenSea manager Nathaniel Chastain had his conviction overturned in the first-ever crypto insider trading case. This landmark reversal could set important legal precedents for how insider trading laws apply to NFTs and digital assets, potentially affecting future enforcement actions.
